response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. Given its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection or operations.

To make this opportunity more appealing, I am extending a special offer to you. For a limited time, you have the chance to secure this product at a price that reflects its true worth while also considering your financial situation. My proposal is to offer the product to you for $900,000.

This price not only ensures you receive a remarkable return on investment but also allows you to benefit from a substantial discount compared to the market value. I am confident that by accepting this offer, you will maximize your investment and gain a competitive edge.

Please let me know if you require any further information or clarification about the product, or if you wish to discuss this offer in more detail. I am here to assist you throughout the process and ensure a smooth transaction.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 900000}
